body_html: When I get the gradient of the InceptionV4 model, I get the same problem. The value of None appears in each BatchNorm layer, I'm not sure if this is an bug. Or, the BatchNorm layer would have no gradient.

body: When I get the gradient of the InceptionV4 model, I get the same problem. The value of None appears in each BatchNorm layer, I'm not sure if this is an bug. Or, the BatchNorm layer would have no gradient.
